name: Fundrizer – Donation and Fundraising Tools
author: LokusWP

sections.description:
Fundrizer helps you build mission-driven fundraising sites with a block-based approach and flexible payment options directly on your site.

Maximize your funding by eliminating platform percentage fees and paying only for your site’s operational expenses.
While gaining the freedom to customize features and maintain control over your branding

Learn more about Fundraising | Demo

Key Benefit

  • Ease of Use: Intuitive block-based interface that simplifies campaign visual creation.
  • Time Saver: Reduces the need for manual record-keeping in fundraising activities
  • Effort Saver: With a block-based approach, you can use patterns to create visuals that save you effort.
  • Money Saver: Eliminating platform percentage fees and paying only for your site’s operational expenses.
  • Speed and Flexibility: With Gutenberg’s block-based design, you will achieve excellent site performance, and with WooCommerce, you gain flexibility with various payment methods.

Interface

  • Funding Form: Allows funders to quickly select predefined amounts, streamlining the funding process and potentially increasing conversion rates by reducing friction.
  • Funding Showcase: Showcases a list of active fundraising campaigns, offering clear visibility into diverse campaigns aligned with funders’ interests for funding.
  • Funding Page: Provides details including its goal, progress, impact, and funding allocation. This approach aims to engage funders deeply and inspire larger contributions through transparency and compelling storytelling.

Management

  • Metric: Setting metrics for campaigns helps in defining and measuring success criteria, making campaign goals more realistic and achievable.
  • Tags: Adding tags to campaigns helps in organizing and categorizing them, making it easier to manage.
  • Analytics: Understanding audience behavior through data helps make informed decisions for better outcomes.
  • Funders Data: See how many funders you have and how much they are spending

Payment

  • WooCommerce: Using WooCommerce as the payment system offers flexibility and robustness, supporting multiple currencies and various payment methods.
  • Method: Utilizing any payment method supported by WooCommerce ensures compatibility with popular payment gateways.

Notification

  • Email: Notifications can include funding receipts, campaign updates, and personalized messages to effectively engage funders.
sections.faq:
Where can I get help if this plugin has issues?

For support with this plugin, please visit the Support Forums.

Privacy Policy

Fundrizer uses Appsero SDK to collect some telemetry data upon user’s confirmation. Integrating Appsero SDK DOES NOT IMMEDIATELY start gathering data, without confirmation from users in any case. Learn more about how Appsero collects and uses this data.
sections.changelog:
0.6.0

  • New: Funders Screen, Admin can now view the funder
  • New: Conversion Rate Metric on Dashboard
  • New: Ability to Campaign and Update at Role Level
  • Fix Fundrizer Dashboard not working in Hybrid Mode
  • Fix Fundrizer Dashboard in mobile not show
  • Pattern Import is Broken: Replace with Latest Block

0.5.0

  • New: Funding Form Pattern
  • New: Funding Status Pattern
  • Improve: Pattern Showcase & Single
  • Improve: Block Progress now more looks good in mobile
  • Improve: Block Amount Box now has currency input
  • Fix: Error saving in Gutenberg Site Editor Mode
  • Fix: Conflict with WPGraphQL plugin

0.4.0

  • Fix: Resolved issue with Analytics
  • New: Funder List Block
  • New: Extending Core Button Block for Quick Amount
  • New: Added campaign tags functionality.
  • Improvement: Removed WPGraphql plugin dependency to enhance user experience during installation.

0.3.0

  • New: Automatically update metadata when funding is received.

0.2.0

  • Fix: Comply with wp.org guidelines.

0.1.0

  • Initial release.
